devdoc.details: Enable whitelisted investors to contribute to the API3 presale.

close().details: Close the presale. Close buys and open whithdrawal operations. Withdraw received ETH and remaining API3 tokens.

constructor.details: Deploy and initialize the API3 presale contract.

params._admin: The address of the admin allowed to perform protected operations.
params._bank: The address to which received ETH and remaining API3 tokens are gonna be sent once the presale closes.
params._price: The price of ETH [in $ per ETH, e.g. $350 per ETH].
params._token: The address of the API3 token.

open().details: Open the presale. Open buys and close whitelisting and pricing operations.

params._investors: An array of investors ethereum addresses to be un-whitelisted.

params._admin: The ethereum address of the new admin.

params._bank: The ethereum address of the new bank.

updateETHPrice(uint256).details: Update pricing operations based on ETH price.

params._price: The ETH price [in $ per ETH, e.g. $340 per ETH] [no decimals allowed]

params._investors: An array of investors ethereum addresses to be whitelisted.

withdraw().details: Transfer any remaining API3 tokens hold by this contract to the bank.

withdrawETH().details: Transfer any remaining ETH hold by this contract to the bank [though it should not be possible for this contract to receive ETH after the presale is closed].

devdoc.title: A Presale contract made with ❤️ for the API3 folks.
